document_data.Mental State: Ilvani is nearly insane although she has occasional moments of lucidity.  Her imprisonment and torture appear to have worsened her mental condition.  After Yaraella's spirit was put to rest her mental condition improved remarkably.{{Cite digital book/The Darker Road}}
